definitions.explanation_en: A surname of English origin, commonly associated with individuals in sports, particularly football (soccer), such as David Moyes, a well-known English football manager and former player.
definitions.explanation_cn: 一个源自英语的姓氏，常与体育界人士相关，尤其是足球领域，例如著名英格兰足球教练兼前球员大卫·莫耶斯。
definitions.example_en: David Moyes was appointed as the new manager of Manchester United in 2013.
definitions.example_cn: 2013年，大卫·莫耶斯被任命为曼联的新任主教练。
